page:
OpenMath Bibliography
The bibliography is numerically sorted in order of year (most recent first) and alphabetically by title within each year. You might also want to check out whats available from CiteSeer.
O. Caprotti and D. Carlisle OpenMath and MathML: Semantic Mark Up for Mathematics ACM Crossroads ACM Press 1999 http://www.acm.org/crossroads/xrds6-2/openmath.html
Xuehong Li XML and the Communication of Mathematical Objects Master's Thesis University of Western Ontario, London Ontario 1999 http://ptibonum.scl.csd.uwo.ca/~xli/thesis.ps
Steve Linton and Andrew Solomon OpenMath, IAMC and GAP Proceedings of ISSAC 99/IAMC workshop 1999 http://www.illywhacker.net/papers/iamc.ps
John A. Abbott, André van Leeuwen and A. Strotmann OpenMath Communicating Mathematical Information between Co-operating Agents in a Knowledge Network 1998 http://www.brunel.ac.uk/~hssrjis/issue/index8.html
S. Dalmas, M. Gaëtano and S. Watt An OpenMath 1.0 Implementation Proceedings of ISSAC 1997 ACM Press 1997 http://www.acm.org/pubs/citations/proceedings/issac/258726/p241-dalmas
John Abbott , Angel Diaz , Robert S. Sutor A report on OpenMath: a protocol for the exchange of mathematical information ACM SIGSAM Bulletin 1996 volume 30, number 1 21-24
CHtCHA, Y. Animation de programmes fonctionnels. Master's thesis, Universitd de Nice, 1996.
Yannis Chicha Animation de programmes fonctionnels University of Nice Master's Thesis 1996
M. Dewar OpenMath: An Overview ACM SIGSAM Bulletin 2000 volume 34, number 2 2-5
D. Carlisle OpenMath, MathML and XSL ACM SIGSAM Bulletin 2000 volume 34, number 2 6-11
J.H. Davenport On Writing OpenMath Content Dictionaries ACM SIGSAM Bulletin 2000 volume 34, number 2 12-15
J.H. Davenport A Small openMath Type System ACM SIGSAM Bulletin 2000 volume 34, number 2 16-21
H. Prieto, S. Dalmas and Y. Papegay Mathematica as an OpenMath application ACM SIGSAM Bulletin 2000 volume 34, number 2 22-26
A. Triulzi OpenMath support under CSL-hosted REDUCE ACM SIGSAM Bulletin 2000 volume 34, number 2 27-30
L. Alvarez Sobreviela A Reduce-based OpenMath <-> MathML Translator ACM SIGSAM Bulletin 2000 volume 34, number 2
O. Caprotti, A.M. Cohen and M. Riem JAVA Phrasebooks for Computer Algebra and Automated Deduction ACM SIGSAM Bulletin 2000 volume 34, number 2 33-37
L. Dirat JOME, a Software Component for Interactive and Distributed Mathematics ACM SIGSAM Bulletin 2000 volume 34, number 2 38-42
M. Kohlhase OMDoc: An Infrastructure for OpenMath Content Dictionary Information ACM SIGSAM Bulletin 2000 volume 34, number 2 43-48
Interactive Mathematics via the Web using MathML F.J. Wright ACM SIGSAM Bulletin 2000 volume 34, number 2 49-57
R.M. Corless, J.H. Davenport, D.J. Jeffrey and S.M. Watt "According to Abramowitz and Stegun" or arccoth needn't be uncouth ACM SIGSAM Bulletin 2000 volume 34, number 2 58-65
A. Strotmatt and L. Kohout OpenMath: Compositionality Achieved at Last ACM SIGSAM Bulletin 2000 volume 34, number 2 66-72
